metadata.dc:author: Silva Blas, Yolanda
Dávalos Errando, Antonio
Bertrán Noguer, Carme
Serena Leal, Joaquin
Vega Iñigo, Remedios
Segura Martin, Tomás
García Garrido, Luisa
Suñer Soler, Rosa
Puigdemont Guinart, Montserrat
Castellanos Rodrigo, Maria del Mar
metadata.dc:description: After a brief introduction about what an lctus Word is, the authors describe the project for an lctus Ward at the Dr. Josep Trueta University Hospital in Girona. Afterwards, the authors analyze its development and its results during its existence. The authors conclude that there has been a significant increase in benefits for patients since they have received new therapeutic treatments in a specialized ward, furthermore, both doctors and nurses have had the opportunity to develop new research projects.
metadata.dc:title: Unidades de Ictus. Proyecto, desarrollo y resultados en un Hospital Universitario.
[Stroke units. Project, development, and outcome at a university hospital].
